definition: Red Eyebrows, rebel group involved in the overthrow of the Xin dynasty 新朝[Xin1 chao2]

sentences.english: The temple is the symbolic architecture of this significant historic event of annihilation of the red-browed peasant insurrection.
sentences.chinese: 該廟是降伏赤眉軍這一重大歷史事件的標誌性建築。

definition: Wang Mang (45 BC-23 AD), usurped power and reigned 9-23 between the former and later Han
refers to the Yellow Turbans Peasant Uprising at the end of later Han (from 184)
the army of Yellow Turbans, a peasant uprising at the end of later Han (from 184)

purple qipao gown, the sign of an official position
thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent
Huangfu Song (-195), later Han general and warlord
to mount a punitive expedition against bandits
Zhang Jue (-184), leader of the Yellow turban rebels during the late Han
to make a new start/to regenerate
Julu county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
